review: i remember giving up on this because i absolutely could not figure out where the heck i was going most of the time
yeah its a nice survival game with lots of immersive elements and a great map system and a spooky cat that likes to chase you

i cant even beat the game it just randomly crashes when i try to use the canteen refill canteen try to science falling off of cliffs getting raked by kitty picking up components of the cure and applying the cure after several attempts though i was able to reach the boat but it ends up crashing there too

warning install community patch before playing  or else you wont be able to read at least one story note and to get several completionist achievements its not gamebreaking stuff but annoying to find out on your own in the end of the game
the game the best

this game is huge it captures perfectly the feeling of being an explorer on a deserted island  a janky old game that will test your patience but if youre after an immersive survival exploration in nature this is it

good game very original and the weather system and clouds look amazing to this day  i just wish the game had more qol features and ran better along with having a safe mode where there is no monster and you could walk around like normal and just explore the island  also needs more fov options to keep from getting motion sick
controls arent good very unappealing landscape and just boring to walk around

its a great game with a beautiful handcrafted map a lot of love went into this one i especially like the triangulation mechanic and the momentumbased player control that is frustrating to suck at but satisfying to master 810 would recommend
i lost 5 hours of progress because of some dumb creature

tense exploration game  make potions with mushrooms to power up and stave off hunger and sickness  stay quiet to avoid what may be lurking out there  watch your footing or you run the real risk of tumbling down a cliff and doing damage  fill in the map by navigating with a realworld compass triangulation system  you really feel like youre discovering the environment

played this many years near release  a fun and interesting cartographytriangulation game i remember getting frustrated occasionally  with the monster and some of the achievements werent working at the time but managed to map everything and finish the game  might play it again when i have the chance

i appreciate what this game is trying to do but i couldnt find a resolutionfov combo that felt comfortable i kept getting motionsick so between trying to focus through the feverblur and feeling a little ill i couldnt get much into the game i really like the mapping aspect but i could not figure out how to make any useful medicines the movement was really slippery when i got bored i couldnt keep playing sorry
i played this game as a kid and wanted to relive some nostalgia but the game still holds very well not so much in terms of graphics but how fun tense and sometimes even scary happy to play it again
miasmata is an immersive and beautiful experience
green cat scary 1010 would recommend

it took me many tries to get the cartography aspect of the game right but i did it  the game feels like an actual adventure through the jungle and the environment as well as the attention to detail kept me coming back to eden for more  strongly recommend playing
as the song goesviva bob n joe viva
yes
i really wanted to love this game but in just 90 minutes of play time i crashed 5 different times thats not a tenable experience considering the time between save points

this is a hidden gem despite many of its shortcomings the experience is no less than reading a thriller its a good reminder on the need for a thriving indie scene as we enter the era of live service quadruple as please make more games ionfx
the light makes it unpleasant to play tbh

the games a buggy mess things seem to break at random my favourite time was when game saving actions caused the game to crash i have no idea what i did to fix it or if the game graciously allowed me to play again some achievements wont work unless you install an unofficial patch that being said 1010 would recommend this game is my roman empire and i need help

oof this game gave me terrible motion sickness and the only option i found thats supposed to address it was an fov slider which never works for me  on top of that one of the things i have a low tolerance for in games is being chased  i have a lot of other minor gripes about the mechanics as well  i liked the concept but there are far too many barriers to me enjoying it
excellent excellent game
fantastic experience unlike any other survival  exploration game out there the only thing that ruins it are constant crashes
unique game mechanic and fun exploration
was a fun game despite its age the triangulation mechanic was really what brought me in would really like to see more games with that type of feature
where is the map  go chart yourself
fantastic game i loved the cartography mechanics
one of the most unique gaming experiences ive ever had

wasnt a bad survival game back in the day not sure how its doing today but it was fun

a game that has sat in my library for 10 years a game that should have been part of my childhood memories that i am now getting to enjoy at an older age i highly recommend this game as it is one of those games you get so pulled into that you cant help but feel that you are always being watched

chill game about a guy going out into the woods and doing shrooms with his cat
he has wheels as feet  he can reverse but not go sideways  he cant swim slow snail walking simulator

an immersive adventure with the right amount of survival exploration and a bit of tension for the extremely low price you are going to pay for it it will be worth
one of the best horror games ever released on steam easily holds up even 10 years later extremely atmospheric so much so the monster will almost always catch you off guard highly reccomend
glitchy  cumbersome controls 1990s graphics constantly crashes on runtime error
interestingly this is the very first computer game i have ever played and it was certainly fun

i  tried to play and the idea was interesting enoughi liked the mapping feature and enjoyed the process of findingdiscovering new plants and slowly filling in the map of the isleand  but ultimately the game crashes started getting so frequent it became unplayable i tried several things to fix the issue and rebooting my computer seemed to help a little  but then it would crash again  became so frustrating i just gave uptoo badhad decent promise
crashed 2000 times
survive and explore on an island

one of the most underappreciated games ever made the satisfaction of exploring an island mapping it out and avoiding a terrifying threat is all perfect play it now in 2022 the dated graphics and animations only add to the charm
ahhhh

a game where exploration is not just something nice you do while you play in miasmata exploration iisi the game   traverse a deserted island any way you want search for clues fill out your map piece by piece avoid the beast that salks you get lost figure out where you are ask yourself how the hell you got there
absolutely terrifying immserive and beautiful i love how tense this game makes me with the subtlety of a constantly looming threat

the game presents an astonishing atmosphere of exploration also has unique gameplay elements like mapping and realistic running mechanics the fact the game is very indie developed by 2 people if im right makes it even cooler
lots of exploration and very little handholding after the first section  intriguing concept and kept me entertained for hours
its janky but the idea is so good that one can forgive the jank no other game has this kind of gameplay so its worth checking out  also fungi iding 1010

now i know how it feels like when people say how they hope they can give maybe for the reccomendation  the game is unique and i havent seen anything like this but the game is riddled with bug that crashing the game  other than that the game is janky as a game this old  recommended but proceed with caution
dull
good exploration of a large area of map with diverse vegetation and landscapes and several challenges along the way

really cool game the map and triangulation aspect is different from any other game i have played the story is also pretty unique and interesting and everything is open and up to you to figure out im replaying for the second time now and enjoying it just as much

miasmata sets your character in a large open world map that deserves full exploration  this game is atmospheric exploration survival danger mystery back story and a tiny part puzzle  i enjoyed it and i definitely recommend
one of those few games that they mark you with such experience
best cartography mechanic ive ever saw in a game

what a cool game i really like this one a lot there were some times where it was a little lonely but not too bad loved all the exploring you do and crafting the story line wasnt too heavy so you never felt bored of it i had a a great time with this one

miasmata is a really enjoyable game the atmosphere pulls you in and keeps you in a survivors mindset as you work your way across a lush island the necessity of staying alive is enough to keep the game engaging for the length of play the beast keeps you fearful the entire time
this was made in 2012 and supports 3440x1440 ultrawide screen no issues and is a delightful jaunt through the forest and hills its wonderful
this game is cartography simulator 2012 and i say this in the most flattering way possible
its a rough unpolished game but the survival experience can get pretty intense and unique the island is big and getting lost will easily end in death so you need to actually use a map and a compass
despite oddly high and low fidelity graphics this can be a very absorbing experience particularly if you let the horror elements do their thing

it seems a bitshallow and i am also walking around with constant anxiety about some hidden danger i have not yet met falling down is annoying as hell it feels cluncky and i keep getting lost this game is strange and to be honest im not really sure if i like it or not but its keeping my attention for now i will reccomend it if its on sale and you are in the mood you might enjoy it but yeahweird
the real first strand type game
if youre looking for a unique gaming experience play this also if youre wondering if its scary in the wilderness at night and want to try it out do it here first

excellent puzzle adventure game once you get oriented with the map everithing is easy the landscapes and the sounds of nature are awesome and very calming the only thing that stressed me up was the stupid creature there is mod nevertheless for dealing with it but in summary is an excellente game
what a weird game its not for me but maybe its for you

i think this is a really good game a break from the needing to be on your toes type game play elsewhere if you enjoy roaming around and exploration this is worth a look i really like the movement system how you are forced to take it easy and not run everywhere it forces you to play the game the way it was meant to be played  please make more of these

it would a great game if there was more of a tutorial to help get a player started  i kept dying of thirst and there was no instruction on what to do  you literally wake up on a beach and have to figure out most of it yourself or watch a video on how to play  this is a major fault  i shouldnt have to watch something to learn how to play

the game is quit fun there isnt much in the way of actual crafting as far as im aware but over all definitely feels like a survival game the one thing i dont really like is how loose the movement controls feel sometimes when my character goes down a small incline one that i think shouldnt be steep at all the character keeps moving forward due to the momentum mechanic in the game other then that pretty good game so far
i love how interesting this game is it manages to be simplistic yet complex and i love the concept of it i started playing again in 2021 and it is still an amazing game
one of the few nice walking simulators

incredible what a small team can achieve  one of my favorite games the mysteriousness of the world drops off a little bit at the end and gets slightly repetitive but overall really amazing i would love to see more games in this world perhaps a prequel or sequel
the first strand type game

this game is the product of an amazing dedication to a vision its controls are intentionally sluggish to begin with and the graphics dont hold up super well aside from some very beautiful sunsetsunrise over water vistas but there is literally no other game that scratches this particular itch highly recommended

i really enjoyed this game it reminded me of myst an island setting and you start with very little info and gather clues as you go along i also am a map and cartography buff so i enjoyed the process of mapping out the islands
good game great experice recommand it despites some bugs unofficial patch help
awesome got it for 3 euro
clunky movement you move like youre in an invisible hamster ball but the island is a pleasure to explore
fun game they did a good job creating an atmosphere that creeps you out you know youre being hunted and all you can do is hide love the suspense

the falling down feature wasnt my favorite and a lot of times the screen was really dark even at like noon a bunch of little graphical issues such as some floating trees some areas having trees but no other type vegetation or rain falling through the roof of cabins the creature cant even be damaged by the weapons so there is no point to them being pickup able  overall i just wasnt really impressed so i dont recommend it
map triangulation is underrated i wish aaa titles would use it

great game with a nice 2000s vibes the graphics are amazing for its era the controls are clunky and you take some time to get used to the rolling mechanic if playing on linux you might get issues with using your mouse so you have to rely on the keyboard for camera movement

this game is a true gem if you love exploration on your own terms without a minimap or waypoint this is for you the atmosphere is topnotch the landscapes are gorgeous and the objective of the game is engaging i cant wait to see what comes next from the team
its great highly recommended

you can jump and you can invert the mouse  the use of motion blur for dramatic effect when your character is dizzy is appropriate  this game is not easy or difficult it is a challenge  the community patch does help smooth out some rough edges  find the cure and become invincible

i cannot recommend this game  on top of awful controls terrible journal ui and weirdest movement physics ive ever experienced it crashes constantly  on the bright side the cartography system is an interesting concept but falls short due the aforementioned issues it ends up being a headache to proper use instead of a cool feature  other than that both the plot and the exploration are very shallow experiences
falls of a gigantic cliff cures wounds with a headache pill  a relaxing and immersive island exploring game felt really cool playing it on my last vacation
although the graphics have aged and it crashes occasionally it is one of my favourite games the only game of its kind

a fun survival game with simple crafting elements and a story direction movement controls really do remind me of being super unwell tired or drunk and having to throw myself towards the fridge using momentum with a constant risk of falling over
